short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Track price history and search by image on Banggood
short.de: Verfolgen Sie den Preisverlauf und suchen Sie nach Bildern auf Banggood
short.es,es_419: Seguimiento del historial de precios y búsqueda por imagen en Banggood
short.fr: Suivre l’historique des prix et rechercher par image sur Banggood
short.pl: Śledź historię cen i wyszukuj według obrazu w Banggood
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Acompanhe o histórico de preços e pesquise por imagem no Banggood
short.ru: Отслеживайте историю цен и осуществляйте поиск по изображению на Banggood
short.tr: Banggood'da fiyat geçmişini takip edin ve görsele göre arama yapın

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,et,fa,f:
Main features:
1. Convenient shortcuts and quick search
2. Price history: You can check any product price history both on the product search page and on the product page (Off by default, you can enable it in the settings)
3. Price drop alert. If the price of the goods in My Favorite falls, you will receive a push notification
4. Search by image to find source products from 1688 and Taobao.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Banggood is a trademark of Banggood, Inc. This extension was not created or endorsed by Banggood.
We do use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics to help improve user experience, but you can opt out at http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
By installing the AliPrice extension, you accept the terms of the "AliPrice Terms of Service" and allow the extension to redirect to affiliate program links, including Banggood and other programs. AliPrice Terms of Service - https://www.aliprice.com/information/index/page/term_of_use
long.de:
Haupteigenschaften:
1. Praktische Verknüpfungen und Schnellsuche.
2. Preisverlauf: Sie können den Preisverlauf jedes Produkts sowohl auf der Produktsuchseite als auch auf der Produktseite überprüfen (standardmäßig deaktiviert, Sie können es in den Einstellungen aktivieren).
3. Preissenkungsalarm. Sollte der Preis der Ware in My Favorite sinken, erhalten Sie eine Push-Benachrichtigung.
Wenn Sie Fragen oder Anregungen haben, können Sie sich gerne an uns wenden:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.en_GB,en_US:
Main features:
1. Convenient shortcuts and quick search.
2. Price history: You can check any product price history both on the product search page and on the product page (Off by default, you can enable it in the settings)
3. Price drop alert. If the price of the goods in My Favorite falls, you will receive a push notification.
4. Search by image to find source products from 1688 and Taobao.
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Banggood is a trademark of Banggood, Inc. This extension was not created or endorsed by Banggood.
We do use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics to help improve user experience, but you can opt out at http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
By installing the AliPrice extension, you accept the terms of the "AliPrice Terms of Service" and allow the extension to redirect to affiliate program links, including Banggood and other programs. AliPrice Terms of Service - https://www.aliprice.com/information/index/page/term_of_use
long.es,es_419:
Principales características:
1. Atajos convenientes y búsqueda rápida.
2. Historial de precios: puede consultar el historial de precios de cualquier producto tanto en la página de búsqueda de productos como en la página del producto (desactivado de forma predeterminada, puede habilitarlo en la configuración)
3. Alerta de caída de precio. Si el precio de los productos en Mi favorito baja, recibirá una notificación automática.
Si tiene alguna pregunta o sugerencia, no dude en contactarnos:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.fr:
Caractéristiques principales:
1. Raccourcis pratiques et recherche rapide.
2. Historique des prix : vous pouvez consulter l'historique des prix de n'importe quel produit à la fois sur la page de recherche de produit et sur la page du produit (Désactivé par défaut, vous pouvez l'activer dans les paramètres)
3. Alerte baisse de prix. Si le prix des produits dans My Favorite baisse, vous recevrez une notification push.
Si vous avez des questions ou des suggestions, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter :
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.pl:
Główne cechy:
1. Wygodne skróty i szybkie wyszukiwanie.
2. Historia cen: Historię cen dowolnego produktu możesz sprawdzić zarówno na stronie wyszukiwania produktów, jak i na stronie produktu (domyślnie wyłączona, możesz ją włączyć w ustawieniach)
3. Powiadomienie o spadku ceny. Jeśli cena towaru w Moim Ulubionym spadnie, otrzymasz powiadomienie push.
Jeśli masz jakieś pytania lub sugestie, skontaktuj się z nami:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
Principais características:
1. Atalhos convenientes e pesquisa rápida.
2. Histórico de preços: você pode verificar o histórico de preços de qualquer produto na página de pesquisa do produto e na página do produto (desativado por padrão, você pode ativá-lo nas configurações)
3. Alerta de queda de preço. Se o preço dos produtos em Meus Favoritos cair, você receberá uma notificação push.
Se você tiver alguma dúvida ou sugestão, não hesite em nos contatar:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.ru:
Основные особенности:
1. Удобные ярлыки и быстрый поиск.
2. История цен: Вы можете проверить историю цен на любой товар как на странице поиска товара, так и на странице товара (по умолчанию отключено, вы можете включить его в настройках)
3. Оповещение о снижении цен. Если цена на товар в Избранном упадет, вы получите push-уведомление.
Если у вас есть какие-либо вопросы или предложения, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с нами:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.tr:
Ana Özellikler:
1. Kullanışlı kısayollar ve hızlı arama.
2. Fiyat geçmişi: Herhangi bir ürünün fiyat geçmişini hem ürün arama sayfasından hem de ürün sayfasından kontrol edebilirsiniz (Varsayılan olarak kapalıdır, ayarlardan etkinleştirebilirsiniz)
3. Fiyat düşüşü uyarısı. Favorilerim'deki ürünlerin fiyatı düşerse anında bildirim alırsınız.
Herhangi bir sorunuz veya öneriniz varsa lütfen bizimle iletişime geçmekten çekinmeyin:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
